name: Pumpkin Spice Blossoms
author: Jill from Michigan
summary: Rich, brownie-like cookie with a sweet chocolate kiss. Hershey's® Pumpkin Spice Kisses are a fall item and becoming more widely available.
ingredients: ¾ cup firmly packed brown sugar
1 (10 ounce) bag pumpkin spice-flavored candies (such as Hershey's® Pumpkin Spice Kisses)
directions: Stir flour, cocoa, pumpkin pie spice, baking soda, and salt together in a bowl
Combine butter, white sugar, and brown sugar in a large bowl
Beat with an electric mixer until light and fluffy
Add eggs and vanilla extract; beat well
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Line cookie sheets with parchment paper
Flatten just enough to keep from rolling off the cookie sheets
Bake in the preheated oven until edges are set and starting to brown, 8 to 10 minutes
Slide parchment paper onto wire cooling racks
Firmly push a candy kiss into the center of each cookie
